reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a great find for anyone travelling on a budget. Initially we were trying to find another hostel, but it had closed, and a local pointed us in the direction of Las Palmas. We checked out the dorms which weren't too inspiring, but were then shown a room which was lovely! Bright, clean, nice bed, TV, air con and a private bathroom. All for 360 pesos (about £18) which was much less than other hotels in Cancun downtown.
reviews.title: Nice little hotel
Solid, non-party hostel
reviews.text: I think the room we had was part of a new block they have downstairs, these rooms are definitely brighter than the ones upstairs, and more private too.
